statements: SELECT * FROM SurveyResults;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM SurveyResults;
SELECT id, survey_id, question, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults ORDER BY survey_id DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY question ASC;
SELECT id, survey_id, question, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE answer = 'Yes' ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT question, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 2 AND answer LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id IN (1, 3) AND question LIKE '%satisfaction%' ORDER BY survey_id, id DESC;
SELECT id, survey_id, question, answer FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = 2 OR answer = 'Neutral' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT response_id, respondent_name, response_date FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 2 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT respondent_name, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY respondent_name;
SELECT response_id, survey_id FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name LIKE '%John%' AND survey_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice' AND survey_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses
SELECT id, respondent_name FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'John'
SELECT survey_question, response FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY survey_question DESC
SELECT * FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_category = 'General'
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM SurveyCategories
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'John' AND survey_question LIKE '%satisfaction%'
SELECT respondent_name, survey_question FROM SurveyResponses WHERE respondent_name = 'Alice'
SELECT survey_question, response FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_question = 'How likely are you to recommend us?'
SELECT survey_question, response FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response IN ('Yes', 'No')
SELECT s.survey_question, c.category_name FROM SurveyResponses s JOIN SurveyQuestions q ON s.survey_question = q.question_text JOIN SurveyCategories c ON q.question_category = c.category_name
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE question_id = 2;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM surveys LEFT JOIN responses ON surveys.survey_id = responses.survey_id GROUP BY survey_name;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT q.question_text, r.response_value FROM questions q JOIN responses r ON q.question_id = r.question_id WHERE r.response_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT u.username, s.survey_name, r.response_value FROM users u JOIN responses r ON u.user_id = r.response_id JOIN surveys s ON r.survey_id = s.survey_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT s.survey_name, COUNT(r.response_id) AS total_responses FROM surveys s LEFT JOIN responses r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id GROUP BY s.survey_name ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, answer FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT survey_name, start_date, end_date FROM surveys WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' OR role = 'Editor';
SELECT survey_name, end_date FROM surveys WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, username FROM surveys s JOIN survey_participants sp ON s.survey_id = sp.survey_id WHERE sp.completion_status = TRUE;
